message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product for $12,000. I believe this price reflects the value it holds for you while ensuring a fair return for us. Please let me know if this offer suits your expectations.

Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, $12,000 is still a bit outside my budget. I'm willing to pay $10,500 for the product. This is the highest price I can go, considering I have another option for $10,000. Let me know if this works for you.

Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your position and appreciate your willingness to meet halfway. Based on our current discussion, I am willing to consider a price of $11,000 for the product. This is the highest price I can offer given its value to you and the market conditions. I hope this proposal is acceptable to you.
